TopicTitle: Jeb keeps coming back from the dead

Articles.Content:
Is there any way to stop Jeb and all the other green men from respawning after they die?

Jeb keeps coming back!!
Yes there is, in the config there's some setting that I can't remember right now that sets if the kerbals respawn or not.
Best way I've found to stop Jeb and the other 2 big ones from respawning is to place them in a parking orbit around Kerbin. If they never die, they have no reason to come back.
go to your savefile persistent.sfs and change "MissingCrewsRespawn = True" to False
Thank you. Just what I needed

Alternately, you could try adapting the song "The Cat Came Back" to the situation...

The Jeb Came Back

The very next day,

The Jeb came back,

They thought he was a goner but

The Jeb came back,

He couldn't just stay awaaaay...

Booosterrrs!

(With apologies to Robert Munsch)
The permadeath flag should be enabled by default tbh.
Why do you keep killing Jeb is a more serious question?

Please consider carefully where you place new threads, this one was in the wrong subforum. Rule 2.4 is in effect.

Thread moved.

The permadeath flag should be enabled by default tbh.

Word, particularly now that career mode is a thing.

Why do you keep killing Jeb is a more serious question?

Indeed.
